A

addGem() - Method in class characters.MainCharacter
Adds a randomly generated gem to the gem inventory.
addGem(GemInventory.Gem) - Method in class items.GemInventory
Adds the gem m to the GemInventory.
addItem(Item) - Method in class characters.MainCharacter
Adds an item to the inventory.
addItem(Item) - Method in class items.ItemInventory
Adds an Item to the ItemInventory if it is not full, or replaces the last Item if full.
addLetter(char) - Method in class items.ItemInventory
Adds a letter to the letter array, and increments the amount of letters.
addSpell() - Method in class characters.MainCharacter
Adds a randomly generated spell to the spell inventory.
addSpell(Color) - Method in class items.SpellInventory
Adds a spell to the SpellInventory.
allItems - Static variable in class items.Item
All Items that exist in the game.
analyzeClick() - Method in class frame.GamePanel
This method is called before every rendering of the screen.
arrowButton - Variable in class frame.GamePanel
The images for the two states of the four arrow buttons in the game screen.
awardGem() - Method in class frame.GameGraphics
Gives the player a gem.
awardItem() - Method in class frame.GameGraphics
Gives the player an item, unless there are no items left in this level.
awardKey() - Method in class frame.GameGraphics
Gives the player a key, or a gem, or a spell.
awardSpell() - Method in class frame.GameGraphics
Gives the player a spell.
